answers.answer: Hello,Yes,  you should have this checked.  Please see your Dr.Depending on the problem they will probably prescribe you antibiotics.  If it is a boil or absess they may decide to lance / drain it to speed the healing.Please do not delay in getting this seen and addressed.Please also work hard to keep your blood sugars on target as this will assist healing.Let us know how you go.

question: I am a diabetic and I used a needle to inject some lantus in my stomach two or three weeks had  passed and I notice a got a knot in my stomach that  has raised and is very sore which I believe is infectedI know I probably need to go the the doctor now and what will they do?
title: diabetes
